name: DPR-PHILIPPINE ACADEMY IN TECHNOLOGY AND SCIENCES INC
about: DPR-Philippine Academy in Technology and Sciences, established in 1981 by Capt. Daniel P. Rivera, a pioneering military, general aviation, commercial pilot, and flight instructor, is a renowned institution dedicated to providing quality academic and technical training programs. Recognized by the Ministry of Education and the Technical Education and Skills Development Authority (TESDA), the academy is certified by the Civil Aviation Authority of the Philippines (CAAP) as an Aircraft Maintenance School for Airframe and Powerplant training. With a focus on practical learning, students work on aircraft airframes and powerplants under licensed supervision and participate in job immersion programs with aviation companies. The academy aims to prepare youth for a competitive world, fostering excellence, discipline, and integrity in a safe and respectful environment. DPR-PATS is committed to broadening technological education and contributing to the development of a better society.
